channel.title: [317] Pker's Fantasy
channel.description:
PKers fantasy is back and running 24/7 because of a new sexy hoster. You may use any client but if the client doesnt work, download our client here.
* Link removed
Pkers fantasy brings the old style PK back to life. It is a 100% lag free pickup PK server. Just because its pickup, doesnt mean we dont have pk rewards. We have plenty of pk rewards such as dragon claws (not too strong), armadyl godsword, fighter torso, dark bow, and many more! Also, all weapon specials work. Yes, that means you can ice blitz granite maul combo people, or range 2h them. We have plenty of nice admins that cant cheat pk points and dont abuse. We also plan on having a website where you can upload your best knock outs. So what are you waiting for? Join now!
Warning: this server may have hardcore pkers. Why don't you try to challenge them?
I AM NOT OWNER! THIS SERVER RULES AND NEEDS PPL.
